byline.contributor: David Montgomery reported from Garland, and Ashley Southall from New York. Cooper Neill contributed reporting from Garland, and Daniel E. Slotnik from New York.
byline.original: By DAVID MONTGOMERY and ASHLEY SOUTHALL

abstract: Series of tornadoes sweep Dallas area, killing at least 11 people and leveling hundreds of homes and businesses; tornadoes are part of wave of severe weather over Christmas weekend that left at least 43 people dead, mainly in Southern states.
lead_paragraph: At least 11 people were killed in the Dallas area Saturday night when several tornadoes swept North Texas, officials said.

headline.main: Tornadoes Leave Paths of Rubble and 11 Dead in the Dallas Area
headline.print_headline: Tornadoes Leave Paths of Rubble and 11 Dead in the Dallas Area

snippet: At least 11 people were killed in the Dallas area Saturday night when several tornadoes swept North Texas, officials said.
